title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...that lies somewhere just over the edgeof your memory.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The one you've been waiting for.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But tonight, when I first saw you...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...and later when I watched you in the darkness,
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...it was as though I had found that one face among all others.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Who are you ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Promise I'll see you again.I must see you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I don't know.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Johann, you don't think I wanted this to happen ?No.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: What are you going to do ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I don't know.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Lisa. We have a marriage.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Perhaps it's not all you oncehoped for. But...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You've a home, and your son.People who care for you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I know that, Johann.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'd do anything to avoid hurting you,But I can't help it.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And your son ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Do you think you can avoid hurting him ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: He won't be harmed, I'll see to that.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: There are such things as honor,and decency.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I told myself that a hundred timesthis one evening.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You talk as though it were out of your hands.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It's not, Lisa.You have a will.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You can do what's right,what's best for you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Or you can throw away your life.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I've had no woe but his, ever.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: That's romantic nonsense.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Is it ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Johann, I can't help it. I can't.Please believe that.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: What about him ?Can't he help himself, either ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I know now that he needs meas much as I've always needed him.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Isn't it a little late for himto find that out ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: We're home, sir.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good night.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good night, sir.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Lisa. If you do this,you can never turn back.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You know that, don't you ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I warn you. I shall do everything inmy power to prevent it.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Hello, darling. Wake up.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It's time to go to your own room.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Did you have a nice time ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes, darling.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good night, father.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good night.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Did you hear ? I just said it.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes, darling.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Tell me about the opera...was it exciting ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: How's that ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You're wonderful.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You're wonderful.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You've always been a wonderful boy.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You know how much that has meant to me.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: To be so proud of you, always.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I know it.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Don't worry, mother.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You'll see.Two weeks will go like an express train.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You sure you're coming ?Of course. I promise.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You can even getmy room in the village for me.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll get you the sameone you had last time.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The one with the balcony.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Didn't I tell youthat compartment was quarantined ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'm sorry, Madam.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: This compartment has to be closed up.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll take you to the next car forward.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: That's good.I'll be near the locomotive.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll take the box.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Do we have two locomotives on our train ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: We usually get along with one.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But I talked to the engineer.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: How about that one over there ?You can have two seats in there.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: He's traveling alone.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Don't worry, Madam.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll take good care of him.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: We leave in about a minute.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Better hurry and get your seat.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You'll see better if you sit over here.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And if you get chilly,you can put up the window.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes, mother.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Stefan. You know how I'velonged so for your being home.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And now I can't even explain.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Maybe some day, very soon...I'll be able to give you a reason.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But now, you just have to believethat it's for your own good.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I don't mind going back so much.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Especially when you're coming so soon.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It'll be like two vacations.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Alright, darling.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Then I'll show you the new walkwe found since you were there last time.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Better get out, lady.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You'll write me often, won't you ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes mother But I can't write very often.It's only two weeks.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good-bye, mother. Two weeks.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Make way, please.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Make way, please.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: What happened ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Someone hurt ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: No reason to get alarmed.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: They say it's a case of typhus.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Typhus ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes. Typhus on the train.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Yes. Madam.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Is Mr. Brand here ? Stefan Brand.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Brand ? One moment, please.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Fritz !
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Hm ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Could you tell me has Mr. Brandbeen here this evening ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Oh, Mr. Brand is no longera customer of ours.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Not for some time.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Mr. Brand these daysis more likely to be found at the Ritz.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Thank you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Good evening, Madam.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I still have nice flowers left.I'm closing up.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And I'll sell you a nice bouquet. Very cheap.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll take those, the white ones.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Don't bother to wrap them up.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It doesn't matter.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Now you can drive on.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Stefan Brand. Is he in ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Thank you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: This is a surprise.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But I assure you a very happy one.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: John didn't prepare mefor such pleasant occasion.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I thought last night...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...that darkness might haveplayed tricks with my eyes.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You're even morebeautiful than I imagined.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Very kind of you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: This is just the hourfor a little late supper.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Or is it too late ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Oh, it makes no different.You're here.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And as far as I'm concerned,all the clocks in the world have stopped.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Exuse me a moment.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: John !
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: John, I'm sorry to send you out so late.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Would you go out to the cornerand get a few things.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: We're going to have some supper.The usual things.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: John makes life possible fora hopelessly single man.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: She fascinates you, too!
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Do you remember...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The Greeks built astatue to a god they didn't know...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...but hoped some day would come to them.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But mine happened to be a goddess.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And you never found her ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: For years, I never woke in a morning,
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: but that I said to myself:
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Perhaps today she will come.My life will really begin."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Sometimes it seemed very near.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But now I'm older and I know better.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Even for yourself,you don't play anymore ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Oh, I remember, last nightyou were kind enough to be interested...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I forgot John lockedit when I went away.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Nowadays, I'm away quite a lot of the time.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll ask him for the keywhen he comes back.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You are very lovely.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It's a beautiful dress.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Thank you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: How could you do that ?Give it up altogether.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Well, if you're so curious,I'll tell you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: One night I came back to this room.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I had given a concert like all the others.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Not better, not worse.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Afterwards,they said all the usual things.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The things you saywhen you are not really convinced.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: So, I happened to look in the mirror.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: This one here.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The young protegï¿½ was no longer young.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Certainly wasn't prodigious.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Since then, I found other things to do.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: More amusing things.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I knew last night. Didn't you ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I haven't evenoffered to fix you a drink.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Stefan.Yes.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I came here...I have something to tell you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: If it has to do with you, l'm very interested.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It has to do with us.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: We can't possiblybe serious this early in the morning.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: At least not without a glass of champagne.Won't be a minute.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Champagne tastes much betterafter midnight, don't you think ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Much better.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I just came back from America.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It's a fascinating country.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: The men are fond of money.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: And their wives... are fond of Europeans.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Must have been a wonderful trip.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Do you travel a great deal ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I suppose you won't believe me,but I couldn't get you out of my mind all day.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: No, I don't believe you.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: If only I had known you were coming...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: To tell you the truth,
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I never dared hopeyou could arrange it so soon.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: But you're so clever,you've managed it so beautifully.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You know, you're a very strange woman.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Am I ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Something you said last nightkeeps running through my mind.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: What is that ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: I'll tell you in just a momentas soon as I get the ice.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Are you getting lonely out there ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Very lonely.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "I come to tell you about us."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "To offer you my whole life."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "But you didn't even remember me."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Can I take you somewhere, young lady ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Anywhere at all ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: It makes no difference.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "I don't remember where I went."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Time moved past me."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Not in days, or in hours."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "But in the distance it put between us."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Now that I think again,I went to my son."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "But is was too late."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "He died last night of typhus."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Without even knowing I was there."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Now, I'm alone."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "My head throbs,and my temples are burning up."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Perhaps God has been kindand I too have caught the fever."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "If this letter reaches you,believe this..."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "That I love you now asI've always loved you."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "My life can be measured...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: ...by the momentsthat I've with you and our child."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "If only you could have shared those moments."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "If only you could have recognizedwhat was always yours."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Could have found what was never lost."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "If only..."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: You remembered her ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Lisa...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Lisa...
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Bring my things.
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: Ready, gentleman ?
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "If only you could have recognizedwhat was always yours."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman

text: "Could have found what was never lost..."
title: Letter from an Unknown Woman
